title._content: [Portrait of Gene Sedric, The Place, New York, N.Y., ca. July 1946] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Gene Sedric, The Place, New York, N.Y., ca. July 1946] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in.
